title: 1989 - War Requiem - Directed by Derek Jarman

sources.title: 1989 - War Requiem - Directed by Derek Jarman
sources.description:
Wilfred Owen, a renowned English poet, volunteers to serve on the front lines during World War I. Stationed in the trenches of Flanders, what he witnesses horrifies him and drives him to write a long poem depicting his experience with biting bitterness and haunting words. He would die on November 4, 1918 ‚Äî just one week before the armistice that ended the war.

Nathaniel Parker as Wilfred Owen
Tilda Swinton as The Nurse
Laurence Olivier as The Old Soldier
Patricia Hayes as Mother
Sean Bean as The German Soldier

üé¨ CREW
Written & Directed by Derek Jarman 
Music by Benjamin Britten (War Requiem)
Cinematography by Richard Greatrex

WHY WATCH?
Sir Laurence Olivier's final bow ‚Äì a moving performance that echoes through time
Unique sensory experience: Britten's choral masterpiece fused with Jarman's haunting visuals
Cult cinema gold ‚Äì an avant-garde war film that shatters conventions like a grenade in a gallery!
